entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 24. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 18.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then light late in the afternoon. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022
